LanguageData.JRWYi.label: Yi
LanguageData.JRWYi.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #09820-2015 [YI QI] CODENAME: WYVERN >332
A scansoriopterygid with membrane between their wings, resembling that of a bat or a dragon. They primarily eat insects and fish, but prey on smaller dinosaurs as well.

LanguageData.JRWYi.tools.right_claw.label: right claw

LanguageData.JRWYi.tools.head.label: head
